text: Raja nariderake balala, ‘yakhana tomara i'usupha theke asatkaja kamana karechile, takhana tomadera ki hayechila?’ Tara balala, 'adbhuta allah‌ra mahatmya! Amara tara madhye kono dosa dekhini.’ Ayiyera stri balala, ‘etadine satya prakasa hala, ami'i take prarocana diyechilama, ara se to abasya'i satyabadidera antarbhukta.’
